title: Michigan G.O.P. Candidates Show Unity as Midterm Campaigns Enter Homestretch
description: Candidates for governor, secretary of state and attorney general join forces to get out the vote.
dc:creator: Nick Corasaniti
media:credit: Emily Elconin for The New York Times
media:description: Tudor Dixon, the Republican candidate for governor, at a rally in Davison, Mich., on Friday.
